EvaluationAnswers.Is the system providing appropriate feed: No, no real-time visual feedback shows the active section.
EvaluationAnswers.Is the language understandable and uses: Yes, menu items use common terms like 'About', 'Skills', etc.
EvaluationAnswers.Can users easily undo and redo actions?: No, navigation jumps are irreversible and lack undo support.
EvaluationAnswers.Are there consistent standards across th: Yes, all nav items are styled uniformly.
EvaluationAnswers.Is recognition prioritized over recall?: Yes, section names are visible and obvious.
EvaluationAnswers.Is the interface flexible and efficient: Yes, one-click scroll makes it accessible.
EvaluationAnswers.Are error messages helpful and expressed: Not applicable; no interactive errors expected.
EvaluationAnswers.Is help and documentation easily accessi: No, help resources or tooltips are missing.

Recommendation: Implement scrollspy or section highlighting to indicate current location in the page.
